title: NIPER Notification 2026 -Apply Online for Project Research Scientist I Posts
description: National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research (NIPER Ahmedabad)  has released an official notification for the recruitment of various Project Research Scientist I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of application. Candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, M.Pharm, M.Sc, and Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIPER Notification 2026 . If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2026 that you can all appl...
